entry.title: Shit Photojournalists Like: Vignetting
entry.summary:
via

LOL, I like the tone of this. Please people, stop vignetting your pictures, it's ugly and most of the time used improperly

shitphotojournalistslike:

.. raw:: html

|image0| .. raw:: html

What’s the best solution to a shitty photo? Vignette that bitch. Camera technology has strived to eliminate the in-camera vignette, and you know how photographers have responded? They fought back. Fear the vengeance of the vignette. .. raw:: html

If you can’t afford a full-frame camera, don’t worry about... .. raw:: html

.. raw:: html

entry.title: the humble rejoice.: pills.
entry.summary:
via

Woot! One of the reasons I still work in pharmaceuticals.

thehumblerejoice:

.. raw:: html

So this past winter break, my sister and brother-in-law had introduced to me a dietary pill called Max Digest that is designed to help the body break down various foods. According to them, the pill would allow me to eat foods with a little gluten such as foods with soy sauce. I’ve tried it a few... .. raw:: html

.. raw:: html
